siteMetadata.title: Jedr Blaszyk
siteMetadata.description: Tech blog by Jedr Blaszyk. Software engineering, search, and AI.

frontmatter.title: Elasticsearch MCP Server: Chat with your Index
frontmatter.spoiler: See how the Model Context Protocol integrates with Elasticsearch to power AI-driven workflows with semantic search.

frontmatter.title: How to Implement Featured Snippets for Search Applications
frontmatter.spoiler: Discover how to implement passage retrieval to enhance semantic search and deliver the most relevant results, just like Google's Featured Snippets.

frontmatter.title: 3D Printing an Aerobar Armrest Riser
frontmatter.spoiler: Prototyping and 3D printing a custom aerobar armrest riser for my bike in preparation for an ultra gravel race. My first time doing CAD design and 3D printing.

frontmatter.title: Question Answering with LangChain, HuggingFace, and Elasticsearch
frontmatter.spoiler: Building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system for question answering using data from this blog as the knowledge source. The entire RAG pipeline and the LLM can run locally in a notebook.

frontmatter.title: Elastic Data Connectors - Elasticsearch Ingestion Made Simple
frontmatter.spoiler: Overview of a new, lightweight data connectors framework integrated with the Elastic stack that can ingest data from any source into the Elasticsearch index.

frontmatter.title: Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 3: Running at Scale
frontmatter.spoiler: Exploring strategies to scale up Apache Lucene to serve high-traffic applications. Looking at how serverless architectures can enable cost-effective scalability.

frontmatter.title: Nrtsearch Tutorial - Indexing Web Content for Search
frontmatter.spoiler: Let's use nrtsearch search engine to support website search with custom ranking and results highlighting. I'm also building a website crawler, data indexer and Search UI to interact with the system.

frontmatter.title: Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 2: Search and Ranking
frontmatter.spoiler: Diving deep into Lucene's search and ranking - data structures, query types, concurrent searching and custom scoring.

frontmatter.title: The Tech Stack of Fast, Free, and Customizable Blog
frontmatter.spoiler: Building a blog with GatsbyJS, GraphQL, MDX and Github Pages.  Customization, open-source and performance - completely for free.

frontmatter.title: Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 1: The Index
frontmatter.spoiler: Exploring Apache Lucene's core concepts - inverted index, insertions and deletions.

frontmatter.title: Geometric Deep Learning - an overview
frontmatter.spoiler: Series of posts covering learnings from my MEng thesis "Geometric Deep Learning for Subcortical Brain Shape Analysis".
